(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
/metadata/android/(?!en)
/values-(?!en)
ignore$
\.avi$
\.gif$
\.ico$
\.jar$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.odp$
\.png$
\.ttf$
\.wav$
^changelog/[^/]*_
^doc/rfc
^\.github/
^\QowncloudApp/src/androidTest/java/com/owncloud/android/sharing/shares/ui/SharesContentProviderTest.kt\E$
^\QowncloudData/src/test/java/com/owncloud/android/data/shares/db/OCShareEntityTest.kt\E$
